Dear all,

I have tried to install Cantera 1.5.3 from sources under Windows XP 
with Visual C++ 6.0 and Intel Fortran 7.0. However, when I 
typed "make win" under cygwin, is stopped with the listed error:

LINK: fatal error LINK1181: cannot open input file "recipes.lib" 
...

Can anybody help me with this problem?

Thanks,
Joe
